channel.title: Clan chat button
channel.description:
hello, i recently started building my clan chat system but when i go to click on it the client highlights the wrong tab, i know its not that big of a deal but looks are everything. Im kinda new to 317's so does anyone think they could help me out with this?
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/mrtutd.jpg[/img]

item.title: Clan chat button
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:4, topic:340323”]i have just the fix for you!

this is a client-sided edit.

in client.java (client sided)

look for

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_866.method348(80, 16083, 1);

and replace the 80 with 113.

save, compile, run.

changing the 80 to 113 moved the redstone over to the right so that it fits over the clan tab.[/quote]

ty man i was needing it tho

Read full topic

item.title: Clan chat button
item.dc:creator: @runemaker runemaker
item.description:
@runemaker wrote:

[quote=“badger41, post:4, topic:340323”]i have just the fix for you!

this is a client-sided edit.

in client.java (client sided)

look for

aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1_866.method348(80, 16083, 1);

and replace the 80 with 113.

save, compile, run.

changing the 80 to 113 moved the redstone over to the right so that it fits over the clan tab.[/quote]
Omg I love you so much now!!! In the future when I get some rep im going to rep your brain out dude!!! I spent like a week building a clan chat system and then one day i just saw that it didn’t line up right! Thank you so much!!!

Read full topic

item.title: Clan chat button
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Slay Pure Slay
item.description:
@Pure_Slay wrote:

Looks to me as a button id, you have it so when you click that image, it will open that tab. If its 317…umm i think you would search just button in client.java and try to figure it out. Haven’t coded 317 in 5 months lol, alittle rusty.
